mapper.select: select a.id, a.silo_id, a.storage_spaces_name, a.create_user_id, a.create_user_name, case when ISNULL(a.create_time) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') end as create_time, a.modify_user_id, a.modify_user_name, case when ISNULL(a.modify_time) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(a.modify_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') end as modify_time, b.silo_name, a.material_category_id from materials_mr_storage_spaces a INNER JOIN materials_mr_silo b ON a.silo_id = b.id where 1=1 and (#{condition.siloId} = '' or a.silo_id = #{condition.siloId}) order by ${condition.order} ${condition.orderby}

select a.id, a.silo_id, a.storage_spaces_name, a.create_user_id, a.create_user_name, case when ISNULL(a.create_time) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') end as create_time, a.modify_user_id, a.modify_user_name, case when ISNULL(a.modify_time) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(a.modify_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') end as modify_time, b.silo_name, a.material_category_id from materials_mr_storage_spaces a INNER JOIN materials_mr_silo b ON a.silo_id = b.id where 1=1 and (#{siloId} = '' or a.silo_id = #{siloId}) order by a.create_time
select a.id, a.storage_spaces_name from materials_mr_storage_spaces a order by a.create_time
